#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

 
using namespace std;
 

#define F(i,a,n) for(i=(a);i<(n);++i)

 
#define MAX 2147483647
int a[1002][1002];
 
int main() {
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t--) {
        int i,j,m,n;
        scanf("%d %d", &n, &m);
        F(i,0,n) {
            F(j,0,m) {
                scanf("%d", &a[i][j]);
            }
            a[i][j] = MAX;
        }
        F(j,0,m+1) a[i][j] = 2147483647;
        i=0; j=0;
        int cnt=0;
        while ( true ) {
            if ( a[i][j+1] == MAX && a[i+1][j] == MAX )
                break;
            if ( a[i][j+1] <= a[i+1][j] )
                j++;
            else
                i++;
            cnt++;
        }
        printf("%d\n", cnt);
    }
}
